greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Howdie, <participant-name>! What a beautiful day. I like the sun, <es name='Emoji_Sun'/>but I also like rain! <es name='Emoji_RainCloud'/> Do you? <break size='0.5'/> You know what I also like? <break size='0.5'/> three <break size='0.3'/> two <break size='0.3'/> one! <es name='dance_pop_00' /> That was so much fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='0.5'/> </es> My friend Sammie is <es name = 'Emoji_IceCream'> selling ice cream on his ice cream truck. I love icecream.</es>

all: <es cat='surprised'> oh no! </es> Sammie might be running out of ice cream. <es cat='worried'/>He needs help looking for more ice cream <break size='1.0'/>
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find ice creams?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together where the ice creams went.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find ice creams?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together where the ice creams went.

c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how long it will take before ice creams all melt. </es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me find ice creams before they melt?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together where the ice creams went.<break size='1.0' />

robot_select: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! I love coming to school and getting to play with you. <es name='affection_05' /> It makes me so happy that I want to dance! <es name='dance_flamenco_guitar_00' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />   <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> You need to first select which robot you want to be</es> , so we can go to adventures together in the robot world. Pick a robot!

all: <es name = 'affection_01'> You helped me find so many ice creams.</es>It is going to be yummy, but make sure you don't eat too many at once! It will give you tummy aches. <es name='SpinHead_01' />

<es name='Yawn_01' /> I feel so full after all that ice cream! I will go back to sweet dreams, while you collect <es name = 'Emoji_IceCream'> the ice cream stickers for both of us. </es><break size='1.0' /> Bye bye.

question0: <es cat='question'> I wonder how many ice cream flavors there are in the world. </es>
question1: <es cat='confused'>I wonder how ice creams are made. <break size='1.0'/>Fairies?</es>
question2: <es cat='question'> I wonder how tall you can stack ice creams? <break size='0.5' /> Maybe 30 scoops?  </es>
question3: <es cat='curious'> It is interesting to know whether animals like ice creams too. </es>
question4: <es cat='question'>Do you think ice creams melt in the cold winter too? </es>
question5: <es cat='curious'> I wonder if they have my favorite flavour, Strawberry. </es>
question6: <es cat='question'> I wonder what the strangest ice cream flavour in the world is. </es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'> I wonder what the strangest ice cream flavour in the world is. </es>
